title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 137.4 - Alternate methods
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 137.4 - Alternate methods

State Regulations

Tax Law, ยง 637(d)

The Tax Commission may, on application, authorize the use
of such other methods of determining a nonresident partner's portion of
partnership items derived from or connected with New York State sources, and
the modifications related thereto, as may be appropriate and equitable on such
terms and conditions as it may require. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
ยง
137.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
